'''13w24b''' is the fourteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 14, 2013<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|345524614216163328|There's a 13w24b with a whole bunch of bugfixes! Get it before it gets you. I don't even know what that means!|June 14, 2013}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w24a]] snapshot.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Status effect]]s'''
* Added [[Absorption]] effect.
** Replaces Health Boost effect in [[golden apple]]s.
** Also added to effects of enchanted golden apples.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:White Carpet JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Carpet]] '''
* Can now be placed on top of any block.
** This includes blocks such as [[water]] source blocks, [[sapling]]s, [[torch]]es, [[chest]]s, other carpets, etc.
* This is part of the fix for being unable to place carpet on [[iron bars]].
=== Commands ===
* The damage dealt by {{cmd|kill|link=none}} is changed from {{hp|1000}} to 3.4×10{{^|38}}
